mapper.select: select * from answer_like where answer_like.replyto = #{questionid} and answer_like.type = 305
mapper.insert: insert into article (articleid, articletype, articlestatus, title, content, cost, createtime,lastmodifytime,authorid,categoryid,rootid,replyto) values(#{articleid}, 304, #{articlestatus}, #{title}, #{content}, 0, now(),now(),#{authorid},null,null,#{replyto})
mapper.select: select userlisttype from userlist, userlist_has_user where userlist.ownerid = #{myid} and userlist.userlistid = userlist_has_user.userlistid and userlist_has_user.userid = #{userid} and userlist.userlisttype != 603 and userlist.userlisttype != 601
